sqlMap.select: SELECT c.checker, c.completed, c.course_id, c.deptid, d.DEPTNAME, c.litigantrole, c.litigant, c.checknorm, c.record_id, c.remark, DATE_FORMAT( c.check_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS check_time, u.USERNAME AS checker_name, cu.course_name FROM course_check_record c LEFT JOIN eauser u ON u.USERID = c.checker LEFT JOIN courseinfo cu ON cu.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN eadept d ON d.DEPTID = c.deptid where c.verify_statu='VS00101'
select count(1) from course_check_record c where c.verify_statu='VS00101'
